data.title: Jesse Birdsall
data.text:
Born: 13-Feb-1963

Birthplace: London, England

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: England

Executive summary: Nicholas Beckett on Bugs

Father: Derek Birdsall (designer, b. 1-Aug-1934)

Sister: Elsa

Wife: Gwyneth Strong (actress, m. 15-Jul-2000, one son, one daughter)

Son: Oscar (b. 1988)

Daughter: Lottie (b. 1991)

High School: Hampstead School, London

Assault 1981 (convicted, "actual bodily harm")

Assault 1999 (attacked a bar patron, London, fined Â£1000)

TELEVISION

Footballers' Wives Roger Webb (2004-06)

The Bill Ron Gregory (2002-03)

As If Paul Sutton (2002)

Bugs Nicholas Beckett (1995-99)

Eldorado Marcus Tandy (1992-93)

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

Beyond Bedlam (1993)

Getting It Right (5-May-1989)

Wish You Were Here (24-Jul-1987)

Revolution (25-Dec-1985)

Shadey (Nov-1985)

Tangiers (1985)

Bloody Kids (Dec-1979)
